column16: Blackstonia perfoliata is a ANNUAL growing to 0.5 m (1ft 8in).  It is in flower from June to October. The species is hermaphrodite (has both male and female organs). The plant is self-fertile.  Suitable for: light (sandy) and medium (loamy) soils and prefers  well-drained soil. Suitable pH: neutral and basic (mildly alkaline) soils and can grow in very alkaline soils. It cannot grow in the shade. It prefers dry or  moist soil.
